markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wasp Guard](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1855)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 19 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 487 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Studded Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=5)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

[Druids](/Classes.aspx?ID=6) and [Calistria's](/Deities.aspx?ID=3) faithful alike value this vindictive armor for its ability to turn away pests and exact revenge on foes in a manner that can easily turn coordinated enemies into a chaotic mass. _Wasp guard_ is _+1 [studded leather](/Armor.aspx?ID=5)_ studded with the carapaces of [wasps](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=99), subtly diverting swarms away and granting a +1 status bonus to Reflex saving throws against Swarming Bites, Swarming Stings, and similar abilities from [swarms](/Traits.aspx?ID=239).

<document level="2" id="action-1552" />

**Craft Requirements** The initial raw materials must include 1 Bulk of wasp exoskeletons.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Wasp Guard
